00025 #include <aeryn/use_name.hpp>
00026 #include <cctype>
00027 #include <cassert>
00028 
00029 namespace Aeryn
00030 {
00032         namespace
00033         {
00041                 std::string RemoveIncarnate
00042                         ( const std::string& name )
00043                 {
00044                         std::string result = name;
00045                         std::string::size_type pos = result.find( "Incarnate(" );
00046 
00047                         if ( pos != std::string::npos )
00048                         {
00049                                 pos = result.find( "&", pos );  
00050                                 assert( pos != std::string::npos );
00051                                 result = result.substr( pos + 1 );
00052 
00053                                 pos = std::min( result.find( ")" ), result.find( "," ) );       
00054                                 assert( pos != std::string::npos );
00055                                 result.erase( pos );
00056                         }
00057                         
00058                         return result;
00059                 }
00060 
00068                 std::string RemoveFunctionPtr
00069                         ( const std::string& name )
00070                 {
00071                         const std::string funcPtr = "FunctionPtr(";
00072                         
00073                         std::string result = name;
00074                         std::string::size_type pos = result.find( funcPtr );
00075 
00076                         if ( pos != std::string::npos )
00077                         {
00078                                 result = result.substr( funcPtr.length() );
00079                                 
00080                                 pos = std::min( result.find( ")" ), result.find( "," ) );       
00081                                 assert( pos != std::string::npos );
00082                                 result.erase( pos );
00083                         }
00084 
00085                         return result;
00086                 }
00087 
00095                 std::string RemoveAmp
00096                         ( const std::string& name )
00097                 {
00098                         std::string result = name;
00099                         std::string::size_type pos = result.find( "&" );
00100                         if ( pos != std::string::npos )
00101                         {
00102                                 result.erase( pos, 1 );
00103                         }
00104                         return result;
00105                 }
00106 
00107 
00116                 std::string RemoveQualifier
00117                         ( const std::string& name )
00118                 {
00119                         std::string result = name;
00120                         std::string::size_type pos = result.find( "::" );
00121 
00122                         if ( pos != std::string::npos )
00123                         {
00124                                 result = result.substr( pos + 2 );
00125                         }
00126 
00127                         return result;
00128                 }
00129 
00137                 std::string TitleCase
00138                         ( const std::string& name )
00139                 {
00140                         std::string result;
00141                         for( std::string::size_type i = 0; i < name.length(); ++i )
00142                         {
00143                                 if ( i == 0)
00144                                 {
00145                                         result += toupper( name[i] );
00146                                 }
00147                                 else
00148                                 {
00149                                         if ( std::isupper( name[ i ] ) )
00150                                         {
00151                                                 result += ' ';
00152                                         }
00153 
00154                                         result += name[ i ];
00155                                 }
00156                         }
00157 
00158                         return result;
00159                 }
00160 
00166                 std::string StripSpaces
00167                         ( const std::string& name )
00168                 {
00169                         std::string result = name;
00170                         while( result[0] == ' ' )
00171                         {
00172                                 result.erase( 0, 1 );
00173                         }
00174 
00175                         while( result[ result.length() - 1 ] == ' ' )
00176                         {
00177                                 result.erase( result.length() - 1 );
00178                         }
00179 
00180                         return result;
00181                 }
00182         }
00183         
00185         std::string FormatName
00186         ( 
00187                 const std::string& name 
00188         )
00189         {
00190                 std::string result = RemoveIncarnate( name );
00191                 result = RemoveFunctionPtr( result );
00192                 result = RemoveAmp( result );
00193                 result = RemoveQualifier( result );
00194                 result = TitleCase( result );
00195                 result = StripSpaces( result );
00196                 return result;
00197         }
00198 }
